question: You stayed at a hotel last week. After you got home you realized that you had left your watchbehind. Write a letter to the hotel manager, and - explain what happened. - Describe the watch, and - ask them to help you find it.
text: I stayed at your hotel a few days back. I am glad to receive the good service and food while my stay.
I was rushed to check out the room due to some emergency. I felt that I had taken all my personal belongings. However, I realised that I forgot my watch in the same allocated place after a day.

I was allocated room number 501, which is located on the 2nd floor of the building. I would like to request you to an inspection of the room. The description of my watch is an analogue dial with a steel belt, Furthermore, The company of the wristwatch is "Titan".

I request you to send me back my personal property to my house, in addition, my communication address is 1002, Shukan Apartment, Chandlodia, Baroda - 201542. Furthermore, I will bear the expanses of the parcel.
I am eager to receive  positive feedback from your side.
